title: Because This Is My First Life
fullTitle: Because This Is My First Life (TV Series 2017â€“2017)
plot: Ji Ho is a single woman. She's a writing assistant of dramas. She's a strong and determined woman. Unfortunately, she has to leave her house and seeks other place to live. Her friends help her to find a roommate. That roommate is Se Hee.
